base_description: Silver laptop and mouse on a white stand.
part_description: The object includes a laptop with a screen and keyboard, and a mouse, all placed on a rectangular white stand. The laptop is centrally positioned, with the mouse to the right.
internal_interaction_description: The laptop is open with its screen upright and keyboard flat on the stand. The mouse sits separately but close to the laptop, allowing for easy access. The stand supports both the laptop and mouse, maintaining their positions for usability.
external_interaction_description: The object is designed for user interaction, allowing typing on the laptop and navigation with the mouse. It can be placed on desks or tables, facilitating use in work or study environments. The stand elevates the laptop for ergonomic benefits and organizes workspace.
